name: Carne Asada al Cilantro
author: gem
summary: In this true Mexican carne asada recipe, skirt steak is marinated in a cilantro-beer sauce and grilled (asada) to perfection. Serve with a side of drunken beans and corn tortillas. If preferred, substitute flank steak for the skirt steak.
ingredients: ½  white onion, cut into large wedges
directions: Combine beer, oil, onion, cilantro, onion, cilantro, salt, and pepper in a blender; blend until cilantro marinade is smooth
Place steak in a large resealable plastic bag and pour cilantro marinade on top
Seal bag and shake to fully cover meat with the marinade
Refrigerate at least 8 hours or overnight
Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat and lightly oil the grate with avocado oil
Grill the meat, turning over once, about 3 minutes per side for medium rare
